issues.description: 4 bulk item pick-up; received check from A2Z Realty on 3/2.  Spoke to Tammy to let her know we received the check and she was wondering when we'd been there last...  I told her about the 7 items we collected $35 for, but she was told that there were quite a few items out to still be collected.  I told her I'd have someone check in with her.

I have reviewed and closed this issue. If you feel this issue has not been resolved to your satisfaction, please contact us by phone at (919) 969-5100.

internal_comments.body:
@ahinks Hey Alison,
  We don't collect Solid Waste from this facility.  I think they might have an outside vendor that takes care of the solid waste.  They should contact their property manager to find out what to do with bulky items.  Thank you
